docs.title: Chat API
docs.text:
A chat aggregator API to access chat conversations across multiple communication platforms such as WhatsApp and Telegram and mail

resource link Github repository chat-api Documentation Azure Devops project

docs.title: Tech stack
docs.text: Developed in .NET framework, hosted on Microsoft Azure App Services with Azure API Management.

docs.title: Tech stack
docs.text: Development runtime .NET framework CICD Azure DevOps Deployment Azure App Service Database Azure CosmosDB Storage Azure Blob Storage API Azure API Management

docs.title: Contacts
docs.text: The Contacts service provides access to contacts via a RESTful API interface.

docs.title: Release 00: Contacts
docs.text: First release is proof-of-concept for basic API to access
